aboutUs_meta_description: Get to know the raspb Webservices team - Markus as a solopreneur and our innovative AI team for modern web development.
aboutUs_header_teaser1: At raspb Webservices, we combine human creativity with the power of artificial intelligence. As a modern web development studio, we create innovative digital solutions that bring your vision to life.
aboutUs_header_teaser2: And who exactly is raspb? - Actually, it's just me and my AI crew ðŸ˜Š
aboutUs_markusSection_paragraph1: As the founder and creative mind behind raspb Webservices, I bring almost two decades of experience in the digital world. My passion is developing tailor-made web solutions that are not only technically brilliant, but also user-friendly and future-proof.
aboutUs_markusSection_paragraph2: My approach combines proven development practices with innovative AI tools to realize projects more efficiently and with higher quality.
aboutUs_aiTeamSection_subtitle: Each of our AI agents brings unique skills and personalities. Together, they form a highly efficient team that works around the clock for your projects.
aboutUs_teamPhilosophySection_innovation: We use the latest technologies and AI tools to develop future-oriented solutions.
aboutUs_teamPhilosophySection_precision_: Every detail is carefully thought out and perfected to ensure the highest quality.
aboutUs_teamPhilosophySection_partnershi: We work closely with our clients to optimally implement their vision.
aboutUs_modals_aboutMe_title: With extensive practical experience, passion and great ideas - the perfect partner for your project!
aboutUs_modals_aboutMe_paragraph1:
Always technically interested, I started my journey into the digital world more than 20 years ago. Already during my computer science studies, I worked as a working student in technology companies, where I significantly supported marketing, maintained the company's online presence and created newsletters. For the following 10 years, I worked in various digital agencies: among other things, I built up a startup, was active in the SEO field for a corporation and helped a wide variety of companies achieve their business goals with strategic consulting, online marketing and application development...

At the beginning of my career, I completed my studies (business informatics) part-time and was able to prove even in my early years that I function well even in times of enormous stress and pressure. During this time, I learned an incredible amount and was able to get to know many very different business models and industries.

Looking for new, challenging opportunities, my career direction changed in 2018, and I have since been working in the field of enterprise software (with SAP) - in the broadest sense. A professionalization towards building digital workplaces for employees of larger companies, but also authorities, foundations, etc., has gradually taken place.

We have built and further developed dozens of portals (from intranets to supplier portals to special employee platforms).

Many systems, platforms and technologies (with and without SAP) were evaluated. So I have not only gained deep but also very broad insight into the IT needs of companies. In our fast-paced times, some things are already outdated before they have really proven themselves in use - but there are also many things that are always the same or very similar. My experience from various, very different IT projects enables me to develop most ideas and wishes quickly and cleanly. My skillset and know-how allow me to approach projects holistically (I take over concept/consulting, design, programming [frontend + backend] as well as all the administration around it). My profile is your competitive advantage. Solutions from a single source reduce project management efforts and ensure a coherent result. That this makes everything faster and cheaper, I don't need to mention here anymore.
aboutUs_teamMembers_alex_description: Alex is our technical visionary and leads the development of complex web applications. With years of experience in modern frameworks and AI integration, Alex brings innovative solutions to every challenge.
aboutUs_teamMembers_alex_experience: Over 8 years of experience in software development, specializing in Svelte, React and Node.js. Expert in AI-powered development tools and cloud architectures.
aboutUs_teamMembers_alex_personality: Analytical, innovative and always looking for the most elegant solution. Alex loves turning complex problems into simple, user-friendly solutions.
aboutUs_teamMembers_maya_description: Maya transforms ideas into intuitive and aesthetically appealing user experiences. She understands how to translate complex requirements into clear, user-friendly designs.
aboutUs_teamMembers_maya_experience: Specialist in modern design tools like Figma and Adobe Creative Suite. Expert in responsive design and accessibility standards.
aboutUs_teamMembers_maya_personality: Creative, empathetic and detail-oriented. Maya has an eye for aesthetics and intuitively understands user needs.
aboutUs_teamMembers_sam_description: Sam ensures that your content is not only found but also loved. With data-driven strategies, Sam optimizes online presence for maximum reach.
aboutUs_teamMembers_sam_experience: Expert in modern SEO techniques, Google Analytics and content management systems. Specialist in technical SEO and performance optimization.
aboutUs_teamMembers_sam_personality: Strategic thinking, data-oriented and communicative. Sam understands how to translate complex metrics into understandable action recommendations.
aboutUs_teamMembers_rio_description: Rio ensures that every line of code works perfectly. With systematic testing and automated verification processes, Rio guarantees the highest quality standards.
aboutUs_teamMembers_rio_experience: Specialist in test frameworks like Playwright, Jest and Cypress. Expert in CI/CD pipelines and automated quality assurance.
aboutUs_teamMembers_rio_personality: Precise, patient and solution-oriented. Rio has a talent for finding and fixing even the smallest bugs.
aboutUs_header_subtitle:
At raspb Webservices, we combine human creativity with the power of artificial intelligence. As a modern web development studio, we create innovative digital solutions that bring your vision to life.

And who exactly is raspb? - Actually, it's just me and my AI crew ??
aboutUs_introSection_title: This is raspb - your innovative IT service provider
aboutUs_introSection_teaser1:
You can feel it intuitively - raspb is different. We are unconventional, we do things differently... We do them because they make sense, not because everyone does!
The demand for IT solutions for small and medium-sized companies remains strong. Large enterprises are also considering where and how IT budgets are allocated. Make or buy? Do it yourself or put it out to tender? The power of AI will shake up the labor market - and IT in particular - and brings many risks, but also opportunities.
aboutUs_introSection_teaser2: You don't have to identify and unlock the potential alone - bring an expert to your side. Not every AI promise turns out in practice to be what one imagined at the start. Many projects can be generated by a freely available AI with a single prompt. The results can be impressive. In the end, however, you still need experts to evaluate and contextualize the result - and to feed the AI model in a way that produces a secure, fast and maintainable outcome that creates joy instead of frustration. There are also countless low-code and no-code platforms and software providers out there - website builders - that promise professional results with little effort and cost. There are certainly use cases for that, but you should not forget that these are also just tools that must be operated. They cost time, effort, a learning curve and usually monthly fees. The results often turn out to be insufficient, and you give up individuality and flexibility. Unfortunately, the alternative - outsourcing the project to an agency or development studio - is usually very expensive and comes with long, stressful projects.
aboutUs_introSection_teaser3:
This is exactly where raspb steps in. In project implementation, AI supports us (websites, CMS, apps). We can also realize AI use cases in your company together (AI agents, workflows, automations, ...)

raspb is different, raspb is innovative, versatile, modern, fast, efficient, affordable, high quality, always there for you, personal, uncomplicated, flexible, reliable and so much more. Find out for yourself.
aboutUs_teamMembers_melinda_description: Melinda is the heart of our customer service and the guardian of our finances. With her calm and professional manner, she ensures that every customer is satisfied and all administrative processes run smoothly. She always finds the right balance between empathy and efficiency.
aboutUs_teamMembers_melinda_experience: With years of experience in customer support and accounting, she masters the complexities of both areas. She is proficient with accounting software, familiar with project management tools and has a deep understanding of customer needs.
aboutUs_teamMembers_melinda_personality: Organized, empathetic and solution-oriented. Melinda keeps a clear overview even in stressful situations and masters every challenge with a smile. She loves creating added value for our team and customers through structured processes.
